description: A classic Filipino dish featuring fried fish topped with a sweet and tangy sauce made with vinegar, sugar, and spices.
instructions: Fry the fish. Prepare the sauce with vinegar, sugar, and spices. Pour the sauce over the fried fish.
label: seafood

description: A simple and delicious baked salmon dish seasoned with garlic and butter, perfect for a healthy and flavorful meal.
instructions: Preheat the oven. Season the salmon. Bake with garlic and butter. Serve with lemon and parsley.
label: seafood

description: A creamy Filipino chicken dish with pineapples, vegetables, and evaporated milk, creating a rich and flavorful meal.
instructions: Sauté garlic and onion. Add chicken and cook until light brown. Add vegetables and pineapple. Pour in milk and fish sauce. Simmer until cooked.
label: chicken

description: A spicy and savory chicken dish with green beans and coconut milk, flavored with shrimp paste and red chili.
instructions: Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger. Add chicken and cook until brown. Stir in shrimp paste and chili. Pour in coconut milk and add green beans. Simmer until beans are tender.
label: chicken

description: A flavorful Filipino chicken dish cooked with shrimp paste, vinegar, and sugar, creating a savory and slightly sweet taste.
instructions: Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato. Add chicken and cook until brown. Stir in shrimp paste, vinegar, and sugar. Simmer until chicken is cooked through.
label: chicken

description: A hearty Filipino beef stew made with tomato sauce, liver spread, and a variety of vegetables, simmered to tender perfection.
instructions: Sauté garlic and onion. Add beef and cook until brown. Stir in tomato sauce and liver spread. Add vegetables and simmer until tender.
label: beef

description: Savory pastries filled with a delicious mixture of beef, vegetables, and raisins, baked to golden brown perfection.
instructions: Cook beef with garlic and onion. Add vegetables and raisins. Fill pastry dough with mixture. Bake until golden brown.
label: beef

description: A comforting and flavorful Japanese curry made with beef, potatoes, carrots, and a rich curry roux.
instructions: Sauté garlic and onion. Add beef and cook until brown. Add vegetables and water. Stir in curry roux and simmer until thickened.
label: beef

description: A rich and creamy beef dish with mushrooms, sautéed in butter and combined with a luscious cream sauce.
instructions: Sauté garlic and onion. Add beef and cook until brown. Add mushrooms and cream. Simmer until thickened.
label: beef

description: A traditional Filipino beef soup with potatoes, cabbage, and green beans, seasoned with fish sauce and peppercorns.
instructions: Boil beef with garlic, onion, and peppercorn. Add vegetables. Season with fish sauce. Simmer until beef is tender.
label: beef

description: A rich and flavorful Filipino stew made with oxtail, peanut butter, and vegetables like banana heart and eggplant.
instructions: Boil oxtail with garlic and onion. Add vegetables. Stir in peanut butter. Simmer until tender.
label: beef

description: A slow-cooked Filipino beef stew with banana blossom and peanuts, known for its rich and hearty flavors.
instructions: Boil beef shank with garlic, onion, and ginger. Add banana blossom and peanuts. Simmer until tender.
label: beef

description: A quick and easy macaroni dish with ground beef, tomato sauce, and cheese, perfect for a hassle-free meal.
instructions: Cook macaroni. Sauté garlic and onion. Add ground beef and tomato sauce. Mix with macaroni.
label: other

description: A popular Filipino dish featuring chicken marinated in soy sauce and garlic, then simmered with vinegar and spices.
instructions: Marinate chicken in soy sauce and garlic. Sauté onion and garlic. Add marinated chicken and bay leaf. Pour in vinegar and water. Simmer until chicken is tender. Add sugar, stir well, and simmer for another 5 minutes.
label: chicken

description: A sour and savory Filipino pork soup made with tamarind, vegetables, and a flavorful broth.
instructions: Boil pork with water, onion, and tomatoes. Add radish and eggplant. Stir in sinigang mix and green chili. Add kangkong leaves. Simmer until vegetables are tender.
label: pork
